name: Jude
short_description: A highly motivated finance professional with excellent payroll management skills and a strong attention to detail, Jude Smiley is experienced in using computer software to handle complex payment processes. With an M.Sc. in Finance from Harvard University, he is determined and willing to learn, with excellent critical thinking skills and fluency in English, Italian and Romanian.

experience.title: Payroll Manager
experience.description: I was dealing a lot with Excel and payment process, so I was using the computer and several softwares everyday.

education.title: M.Sc. Finance
education.description: I completed a Master in Fianance and Payroll

hobbies.hobby: I like playing with computer and coding

skills.skill: reliable, attention to details, punctual, critical thinking, willing to learn, determined.
